snippet.title: Morphite Trailer #2 - An atmospheric sci fi fps - Release date!
snippet.description:
Coming to Nintendo Switch, Xbox One, PS4, iOS, and Steam this September. Update: September 20th release date!

Switch might be delayed, depending if Nintendo approves in time.

An atmospheric sci fi first person adventure!

Myrah Kale will voyage to the furthest corners of space and explore uncharted procedurally-
generated planets, each with diverse landscapes and teeming with exotic flora and fauna. With
the help of a scanner, Myrah will sell biological information for ship, suit and weapon upgrades.  She will explore hand-crafted worlds as part of the main storyline.

Inside Myrah’s vessel, players will engage in random encounters with real-time space combat,
trade with other travelers across the galaxy and navigate outer space with Morphite’s easy-to-
use Starmap system.

More info available at crescentmoongames.com/wordpress/morphite
